lyric:
[00:00.000] 作词 : Avril Lavigne/John Feldmann/Derek "MOD SUN" Smith/Omer Fedi/Marshmello
[00:00.299] 作曲 : Avril Lavigne/John Feldmann/Derek "MOD SUN" Smith/Omer Fedi/Marshmello
[00:00.599] Eh-oh
[00:02.913] You shoulda known better, better to **** with someone like me
[00:06.485] Eh-oh
[00:08.469] Forever and ever, you're gonna wish I was your wifey
[00:11.499]
[00:11.670] Don't act so innocent, this was no accident
[00:17.307] You planned this in the end and now it's over
[00:22.930] Say what you wanna say, you lied and I got played
[00:28.489] You threw it all away and now it's over
[00:34.098]
[00:34.273] Just face it, we didn't make it
[00:37.027] You bit off more than you can chew, can you taste it?
[00:40.082]
[00:40.325] Eh-oh, you should've known better, better to **** with someone like me
[00:45.938] Eh-oh, forever and ever you're gonna wish I was your wifey
[00:50.955] Should've held on, should've treated me right
[00:53.772] I gave you one chance, you don't get it twice
[00:57.302] Eh-oh, and we'll be together never, so baby, you can bite me
[01:02.683]
[01:03.171] Don't hold your breath 'cause you're still chokin' on your words
[01:09.001] Those things you said might be the last ones that I heard
[01:13.897] So come pick up your clothes from the front yard
[01:16.283] Sprinklers on, burn the rest in the backyard
[01:19.089] Shoulda had the guts to say goodbye
[01:21.647] Now you're gonna have regrets for the rest of your life
[01:24.983]
[01:25.151] Just face it, we didn't make it
[01:27.907] You bit off more than you can chew, can you taste it?
[01:30.732]
[01:31.082] Eh-oh
[01:33.048] You shoulda known better, better to **** with someone like me
[01:36.743] Eh-oh
[01:38.726] Forever and ever, you're gonna wish I was your wifey
[01:41.725] Shoulda held on, shoulda treated me right
[01:44.594] I gave you one chance, you don't get it twice
[01:48.148] Eh-oh
[01:50.001] And we'll be together never, so baby, you can bite me
[01:53.064]
[01:53.244] I bet you taste me on the tip of your tongue
[01:55.808] Tip of your tongue, tip of your tongue
[01:58.949] I fell fast when I know I should've run
[02:01.332] Know I should've run, know I should've run
[02:04.599] I bet you taste me on the tip of your tongue
[02:07.053] Tip of your tongue, tip of your tongue
[02:10.259] I fell fast when I know I should've run
[02:12.636] Know I should've run, know I should've run
[02:16.321]
[02:16.476] Eh-oh
[02:18.167] You shoulda known better, better to **** with someone like me (Like me)
[02:22.091] Eh-oh
[02:23.844] Forever and ever, you're gonna wish I was your wifey (Your wifey, yeah, yeah, yeah)
[02:26.969] Shoulda held on, shoulda treated me right (Yeah, yeah, yeah)
[02:29.732] I gave you one chance, you don't get it twice
[02:33.039] Eh-oh
[02:35.194] And we'll be together never, so baby, you can bite me
tlyric:
[by:维尔日记]
[00:00.599]
[00:02.913]你早该知道 不能和我这样的人纠缠
[00:06.485]
[00:08.469]你别痴心妄想着能 自始至终都拥有我
[00:11.499]
[00:11.670]别惺惺作态 装无辜 这绝非是偶然
[00:17.307]最终都是你的预谋 如今都已告终
[00:22.930]你畅所欲言 你满口谎言 将我糊弄
[00:28.489]随后你便置身事外 如今都已告终
[00:34.098]
[00:34.273]直面现实吧 我们就没成过
[00:37.027]是你不自量力 尝到苦果了吧
[00:40.082]
[00:40.325]你早该知道 不能和我这样的人纠缠
[00:45.938]你别痴心妄想着能 自始至终都拥有我
[00:50.955]你也就该对我坚持到底 将我真诚善待
[00:53.772]曾给过你机会 错失便再无
[00:57.302]我们将永远分离 亲爱的 你真的让我很反感
[01:02.683]
[01:03.171]别对我抱过多希望 毕竟你仍如鲠在喉
[01:09.001]或许余生往后 我不能再听你言语
[01:13.897]所以来前院捡拾好你的衣服吧
[01:16.283]在后院浇灭残留殆尽的过往
[01:19.089]本该有勇气来道别
[01:21.647]现在你将倍感愧疚 度过余生
[01:24.983]
[01:25.151]直面现实吧 我们就没成过
[01:27.907]是你不自量力 尝到苦果了吧

[01:53.064]
[01:53.244]我敢笃定 你对我的爱片面浅显
[01:55.808]片面浅显 片面浅显
[01:58.949]在知道该紧急撤退时 我却不禁沉沦
[02:01.332]明知要逃离 明知要逃离
